name: Kento Team
author: KentoThemes

sections.description:
Super simple plugin for displaying team or company members list on page post or anywhere by using shortcodes

Live Preview: http://kentothemes.com/demo/kento-team/

Plugin Features

  • Shortcode System.
  • Unlimited Team Members.
  • Four Style to display Team members.
  • Facebook, Twitter, Google Plus, LinkedIn, YouTube, Skype contact link.
  • Custom Profile Field on user profile.
  • Team Members Image from Gravatar.
sections.installation:
1. Install as regular WordPress plugin.
  2. Go your Pluings setting via WordPress Dashboard and activate it.
  3. This Plugin doesn’t have any setting page
  4. After Activate Use short code [team id=”1,4,2″ style=”4″].

ShortCodes Details

Use “id” as author id of your wordpress user id
Use comma(,) by separating multiple user

How to get user id ?

Please go your WordPress Admin Dashboard and “User” menu on users list then hover mouse on “Edit” link on every username bellow and see the value “user_id=3” get this value and add to “id” value on shortcode

and set shortcode value for “style” 1 to 4 meaning of one to four predefined style.
Please see the screenshot for style.
